data.text: @irfansharudin Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@fybiely สวัสดีค่ะ ทางทีมงานขอแจ้งให้ทราบว่าเที่ยวบินภายในประเทศทั้งหมด จะปฏิบัติการโดยการบินไทยสมายล์ค่ะ
@Stefan_baisden We would like to inform you that it takes time within 90 days.
@RahulK1978 In this case, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
@xiinxin We would like to inform you that as our social media team we do not have authorized to access the ticket information that booked through an agency. We do apologize for the inconvenience.
@xiinxin We would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket.
@xiinxin In this case, we would like to suggest you to contact your agency first for refund issue.
@xiinxin Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@xiinxin We suggest you contact our THAI office in your departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR on Mon-Fri in business hours for information and assistance.
@isabelephant Hello. We would like to suggest that you contact our Thai Airways office in your city of departure to change the time or date of flight at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR.

@ReneEmmerink We would like to inform you that refunds can be made by contacting any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR. Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
@ReneEmmerink If there are any updates on this issue, our officers will contact you as soon as possible.

data.text: @bongtao ขอขอบพระคุณที่ท่านวางใจเดินทางกับการบินไทยค่ะ และในช่วงนี้สถานการณ์การแพร่ระบาดของเชื้อไวรัสโควิด-19 (COVID-19) ยังทวีความรุนแรงโปรดดูแลสุขภาพและสวมหน้ากากอนามัยด้วยนะคะ ด้วยความปรารถนาดีจากทีมงาน THAI Social Media ค่ะ

data.text: @areebaruhaan Hello. You can check the details of the flight cancellation announcement at the link: https://t.co/rV6EJKiFHE And can check the details of available flights and change travel times at the link https://t.co/OCivPhXBVe by specifying the route, date you want to check

@soundofreverie_  We would like to recommend that you contact via email at contact@service.thaiairways.com and net.flightrsvn@thaiairways.com by informing the following information
1. Name-Surname (English)
2. Reservation Code 
3. Flights and travel dates
4. Intent
@soundofreverie_ Greetings, we suggest that you contact our THAI office in the city of your departure at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR in order to give you for further information.
@eraineydays Greetings, we would like to recommend you that contact at  Larn Luang or contact Suvarnabhumi Airport Office you can check contact information at link: https://t.co/MG40qrCSZi
@Nischaljhingan @YatraOfficial Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket. (2/2)

@Nischaljhingan @YatraOfficial We would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket. (1/2)
@ReneEmmerink Greetings, may we inquire your flight number please?
@Nischaljhingan Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@Dom45960947 May we inquire which e-mail that you has sent to please?
@4Chrys1 Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any further questions.

data.text: @Salmon_Voyages Due to the high volume of requests, we are receiving via email response to yours may take some time. We're sorry for the inconvenience.
@sosablair If you've booked through a Travel Agent, please contact them directly.
@Rishabh46965010 In this case, we would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket.
@Rishabh46965010 TG242 on 31 March is canceled. May we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways? https://t.co/84Oh9GaYNF
@sosablair If you are booked with a travel agent, you should contact the travel agent to rebook or cancel/refund your ticket.
@Stefan_baisden  If there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible. Once again, we are sorry for the inconvenience.
@Rishabh46965010 Greetings, may we ask for the departure time? You can check the flight status at https://t.co/aN68EHeb2d
@drasimplegon May we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@Stefan_baisden Please be informed that, normally, the process of investigation does take some time. If there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible.

@MikeSavelberg 4. inform whether you want to cancel/refund/changes
Our officers will check the terms and conditions of your ticket by the provided information and reply back to you as soon as possible. (2/2)
@Stefan_baisden You can contact them by email as well.
@Stefan_baisden Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
@Stefan_baisden Greetings, we would like to inform you that refunds can be made by contacting any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR
@MikeSavelberg Our office is open, we would like to inform you that refunds can be made by contacting any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR
@MikeSavelberg You have to contact any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city for your request.
@benjrmckinney Our officers will check the terms and conditions of your ticket by the provided information and reply back to you as soon as possible.

@Nikkijarvis You have to contact them by send an email to reservations@thaiairways.co.uk

Please specify the information in the email as follows
1. Name-Lastname (English)
2. reservation code with 6 digits
3. Travel date
4. Your route
5. Your request
@benjrmckinney Please be informed that, normally, the process of investigation does take some time, we are sorry for the inconvenience.
@StrayasRides We would like to inform you that refunds can be made by contacting any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR
@TdcwkhX6ij18Daq Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket that you choose.
@benjrmckinney Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@Nikkijarvis Greetings. In this case, you have to contact them by send an email to reservations@thaiairways.co.uk
@StrayasRides Our officers will check the terms and conditions of your ticket by the provided information and reply back to you as soon as possible.

@malissataylor As our THAI office has a large number of contacts. We suggest that you contact them again later or contact them by email, we are sorry for the inconvenience.

Please note, that the office has available in business hours 9.00-17.00 Monday-Friday.

@azneyzaa Please be informed that, normally, the process of investigation does take some time. If there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible.

@malissataylor In this case, we suggest that you contact our THAI Contact Center at +662-356-1111 (24 hours) and press 911 for English assistance or send an email to contact@service.thaiairways.com for assistance.
@StrayasRides Please be informed that, normally, the process of investigation does take some time. If there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible.

@Otarra4 If you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket. Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket.

data.text: @ParmajUdayraj We suggest that you delete your personal information for security reasons and send us via inbox instead so we can keep you posted. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
@aeyyrikaa สวัสดีค่ะ เบื้องต้น ทีมงานแนะนำให้ท่านนำไมล์สะสมไปแลกรางวัลไลฟ์สไตล์ รายละเอียด ที่ลิงฺก์ https://t.co/DtdZ1UHfLC หรือบริจาคไมล์สะสมได้เข่นกันค่ะ รายละเอียด คลิก https://t.co/YiDQQTlw5u
@Merigs13 This is the direct email of our related department, please wait they will reply back soon.
@deadlydarklord Thank you for your kind trust and we look forward to seeing you onboard again. 💕💕💕
@Schnitzl4 We are sorry for the inconvenience. As there are many people contact us at the moment, it may take a while for our officers to get back to you soon.

@anujsharma0514 If you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket. Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
@Neeravana As mentioned, please contact the travel agent.
@JordanAlicia8 We suggest you contact net.flightrsvn@thaiairways.com. If your have urgent issue, we suggest that you go to our office at the airport. We are sorry for the inconvenience.

@Zaviera_ZW สวัสดีค่ะ ทีมงานแนะนำให้ท่าน ส่งอีเมลไปที่ net.flightrsvn@thaiairways.com โดยแนบหมายเลขการจอง ชื่อสกุล วันและเวลาที่เดินทาง พร้อมความประสงค์ในอีเมลค่ะ

สำหรับบัตรโดยสารที่ออกผ่านตัวแทนจำหน่าย ให้ท่านติดต่อผ่านตัวแทนจำหน่ายโดยตรงนะคะ
@hepster12 We would like to suggest that you contact our Thai Airways office in your city for your request again.
